newsitem.title: SINGAPORE: Taiwan buys November unleaded reformate around $23.80.
newsitem.headline: Taiwan buys November unleaded reformate around $23.80.

text.p: Taiwan's state-owned Chinese Petroleum Corp (CPC) has bought by tender one cargo of 95-octane reformate around $23.80 per barrel for November 1-20 delivery on a cost-and-freight basis, a CPC source said on Wednesday.
The 250,000-barrel cargo will be delivered to Keelung or Taichung.
In its last tender, CPC bought 500,000 barrels of unleaded reformate for October 16-30 delivery at nearly $24.00 per barrel c-and-f basis.
